basilMod:Whiskey.NAME: Whiskey
basilMod:Whiskey.DESCRIPTION: Gain 2 extra Strength and Dexterity from basilmod:Inebriated .

basilMod:Counterspell.NAME: Counterspell
basilMod:Counterspell.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy intends to debuff, gain !M! Artifact.

basilMod:Retribution.NAME: Retribution
basilMod:Retribution.DESCRIPTION: Whenever an enemy inflicts a debuff, apply 2 Constricted to ALL enemies.

basilMod:Rebuttal.NAME: Rebuttal
basilMod:Rebuttal.DESCRIPTION: Deal Damage equal to an enemy's intended damage.

basilMod:Counter.NAME: Counter
basilMod:Counter.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy intends to attack, gain !M! Thorns.

basilMod:LightningRune.NAME: Lightning Rune
basilMod:LightningRune.DESCRIPTION: basilmod:Rune. NL Deal !basilMod:RunescarredValue! Damage to all enemies. NL Exhaust.
basilMod:LightningRune.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: basilmod:Rune. NL Deal !basilMod:RunescarredValue! Damage to all enemies.

basilMod:FlameRune.NAME: Flame Rune
basilMod:FlameRune.DESCRIPTION: basilmod:Rune. NL Deal !D! Damage and gain !basilMod:RunescarredValue! strength. NL Exhaust.
basilMod:FlameRune.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: basilmod:Rune. NL Deal !D! Damage and gain !basilMod:RunescarredValue! Strength.

basilMod:FrostRune.NAME: Frost Rune
basilMod:FrostRune.DESCRIPTION: basilmod:Rune. NL Apply !basilMod:RunescarredValue! Slow. NL Exhaust.

basilMod:EarthRune.NAME: Earth Rune
basilMod:EarthRune.DESCRIPTION: basilmod:Rune. NL Gain !basilMod:RunescarredValue! block per enemy. NL Exhaust.
basilMod:EarthRune.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: basilmod:Rune. NL Gain !basilMod:RunescarredValue! block per enemy.

basilMod:CreepingBriars.NAME: Creeping Briars
basilMod:CreepingBriars.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Thorns at the start of your turn.

basilMod:CurseRune.NAME: Curse Rune
basilMod:CurseRune.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL basilmod:Rune. NL At the end of your turn, lose !basilMod:RunescarredValue! HP. NL Exhaust.

basilMod:Counterbuff.NAME: Counterbuff
basilMod:Counterbuff.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy intends to buff, apply !M! basilmod:Rust.

basilMod:TakeABreak.NAME: Take A Break!
basilMod:TakeABreak.DESCRIPTION: Heal !M! HP for each stack of basilmod:Runescarred. NL Remove all basilmod:Runescarred. NL Exhaust.

basilMod:Cleanse.NAME: Cleanse
basilMod:Cleanse.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy for each stack of basilmod:Runescarred. NL Remove all basilmod:Runescarred.

basilMod:Procrastinate.NAME: Procrastinate
basilMod:Procrastinate.DESCRIPTION: Every time you draw this card, increase its effects by !M!. NL Gain !basilMod:MiscValue! stacks of basilmod:Regen, Strength, and Dexterity. NL Exhaust.
